resources.string: At the start of the game each player will be dealt half a deck(26 cards) faced down.
Each turn both players play a card faced up and the player with the highest rank card takes both cards and put them at the bottom of their stack.
If the cards are the same rank, both players play one card faced down and another faced up. Again the player with the higher ranked card takes all of the played cards.
The game is won by the player that has every card.
